description: Numbers n such that n remains prime through 3 iterations of function f(x) = 9x + 4.
comments: n, 9*n+4, 81*n+40 and 729*n+364 are primes. [From _Vincenzo Librandi_, Aug 04 2010]
prog: (MAGMA) [n: n in [1..450000] | IsPrime(n) and IsPrime(9*n+4) and IsPrime(81*n+40) and IsPrime(729*n+364)] [From _Vincenzo Librandi_, Aug 04 2010]
author: _David W. Wilson_
